definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="116" y="64"><field name="trigger">player_right_click_block</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems_oredictionary"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">fallout_wastelands_:gun</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_nbt_num_set"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">when the player opens a door or chest they swing their hand causing a gun in their hand to shoot, this procedure detects this and sets a short cooldown on the gun to avoid shooting, There is another procedure doing this too in this same folder for dropping items</comment><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">cooldown</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
